items.sentence: Tom isn't the only one who thinks that it would be a good idea to get there early.
Three years ago, Tom's doctor told him that he only had three months left to live.
Buttered toast always falls butter side down because butter is heavier than bread.
Mary suffered from severe postnatal depression after the birth of her first child.
It'll be hard to find a good vocalist who isn't already working with another band.
